abstract: Felipe Cortes opened Los Amigos Fishing and Hunting Club on Lower East Side of Manhattan in 1961, when area was grim and dangerous; most of club's members are in their 60s, 70s and 80s, and bear scars of knifings and shootings.
lead_paragraph: At Los Amigos Fishing and Hunting Club, dominoes have replaced softball and outdoor expeditions, but some members bear the scars of knifings and shootings.

headline.main: Holdouts From Rougher Era Endure at Lower East Side Club
headline.print_headline: A Social Club of Survivors Holds Out

snippet: At Los Amigos Fishing and Hunting Club, dominoes have replaced softball and outdoor expeditions, but some members bear the scars of knifings and shootings.

keywords.value: Los Amigos Fishing and Hunting Club
